include ("${EXTERNALS_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (LEVELDB_ARCHIVE "${LEVELDB_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/libleveldb.a")

register_external_lib (libleveldb ${LEVELDB_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${LEVELDB_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${LEVELDB_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/include -D_BUILT_IN_LEVELDB")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${LEVELDB_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/include -D_BUILT_IN_LEVELDB")
